content.question: One reason that the artist used a variety of patterned shapes and collage elements was to

choices.label: move toward an art of pure abstraction
camouflage the figure so it would blend into the background
emphasize the handmade quality of the work
recall specific imagery from traditional folklore

content.answer: camouflage the figure so it would blend into the background

topic.text: 10.1: Materials, Processes, and Techniques in Global Contemporary Art

skill.text: Skill 1.C: Explain how artistic decisions about form, style, materials, technique, and/or content shape a work of art (or group of related works of art).
